price: Lubbuun hundi haala ishee wajjin oofaafi ragaa bahaan jiranuun dhufte.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
